attributes.action: Biometrics and new measures surrounding identity be optional
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems the government is introducing many new laws and measures regarding identity, and it appears to be for their own benefit, I am quite capable of looking after my own identity as I'm sure are many other people, I find it insulting to be forced into doing things that I believe are not necessary.
If you cannot look after your own identity then you do not deserve one, or  if you do not trust yourself with it, then perhaps turn to the government measures, it is just one more step to a totally oppressive dictatorial state. Lets get them to stop telling us how to look after our own lives.
